she has had an uneventful postoperative night.
she put out 1175 ml of urine since surgery.
her calcium level was 7.5 this morning.
she has been on three tums orally b.i.d. and i am increasing three tums orally q.i.d. before meals and at bedtime.
i have asked her to increase her prednisone when she goes home.
she will be given lortab elixir 2 to 4 teaspoons orally every four hours p.r.n. pain, dispensed #240 ml with one refill.
